title: Add About Florida Dave section with wave divider

requirements.text: Add an 'About Florida Dave' section to the frontend that displays a short bio paragraph describing Florida Dave as a 40-year-old entrepreneur building ideas publicly — spanning content creation and domain investing — and documenting the journey toward location freedom and beach living.

quotes: Short paragraph explaining that Florida Dave is a 40-year-old entrepreneur building ideas publicly — from content creation to domain investing — documenting the journey toward location freedom and beach living.

acceptanceCriteria: A clearly labeled 'About Florida Dave' section is visible on the app (e.g., on the home/feed page or a dedicated About page/section).
The section contains a short paragraph with the described content: age, entrepreneurship, content creation, domain investing, location freedom, and beach living.
Text is legible and styled consistently with the rest of the app's design system.

requirements.text: Add a subtle decorative wave-shaped SVG divider line above or below the About Florida Dave section to visually separate it from adjacent content.

quotes: Include subtle divider line with wave design.

acceptanceCriteria: A wave-shaped SVG or CSS divider line is rendered adjacent to the About section.
The divider is subtle — not overpowering — and harmonizes with the existing color palette.
The wave divider spans the full width of the section container.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/hooks/ (useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts) or frontend/src/main.tsx.
Do not alter existing backend logic or data models.
nonGoals: Fixing the existing video/likes/view count display issue (separate known issue).
Adding a new backend endpoint or storing About content in the canister.
Creating a fully separate About page with routing — the section can be embedded in an existing page.
